post.author: Shallow
post.body: The first material you apply to an object gets applied to the whole mesh because you aren't allowed to mix sufaces with and without materials on an object. Make a neutral material and apply that to the whole object first if this really bothers you that much.

post.author: _shank
post.body:
Make a cube, convert to poly, select few polys and then fire up the material editor(m)

select a bitmap or just change the diffuse color of the material

Assign matetrial selection (3rd button below the material slots)

Show map in viewport (9th button below the material slots)

The selcted polys with get the new material and the others will probably become grey
